One thing that came up into my head is Pepa's wedding. We know her mood changes the weather so I wonder if it was actually going to be a storm if Bruno hadn't told Pepa about the future. According to the song, Felix says "why did he tell her?" and after that she instantly expresses how nervous she got. Was that some kind of future paradox? If he had never told Pepa about the weather, there wouldn't have been any storm in the first place but because he saw the storm, he had to tell her?

It kinda reminds me of That's So Raven when everything she does to stop her visions from happening was actually what caused the vision to happen in the first place.

imagine if every madrigal were playing hide and seek
assuming mirabel was the seeker, this is how i think it would play out
luisa would use her abilities to create barricades, forcing mirabel to take more time in getting to her
isabela would use her abilities to hide in some flowers, or maybe blind mirabel
camilo would definitely turn into a random object, like a desk or one of the roof shingles
dolores would always know where mirabel was, so for her she'll really just be trying to hide from mirabel
pepa would probably just lose instantly, she doesnt have much going for her and if she starts freaking out, the weather will reveal her
antonio would have some rats feeding him the location of the seeker, basically dolores except he doesnt have to go "wait is that camilo or mirabel?"
bruno wouldn't even be able to use his gift, it'd reveal him

alternate scenarios for different seekers
luisa: not much going for her
isabela: use her powers to block off exits if she thinks someone is in a room
camilo: pretend to be another hider
dolores: instantly wins, she already knows where everyone is
pepa: cause small and controlled tornadoes or disasters to scare everyone into revealing themselves
antonio: will win as long as his animals can find the hiders
bruno: use the environment in his visions to pinpoint people (even though i dont think he controls what he sees)

characters without gifts werent included, they'll just be playing normal hide and seek
